Verses: 1 keeleyaaththin Kudigalile Thisbiyanaagiya Eliyaa Aagaabai Nokki: En Vaakkinpadiye Andri Indha Varushangalile Paniyum Mazhaiyum Peyyaadhirukkum Endru Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Munbaaga Nirkira Naan Avarudaiya Jeevanaikkondu Sollugiren Endraan.
2 pinbu Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Avanukku Undaayitru, Avar:
3 nee Ivvidaththai Vittuk Keezhththisaiyai Nokkip Poi, Yordhaanukku Neraayirukkira Kereedh Aatrandaiyil Oliththukkondiru.
4 andha Aatrin Thanneeraik Kudippaai; Ange Unnaip Poshikka, Kaagangalukkuk Kattalaiyiduven Endraar.
5 avan Poi, Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyinpadiye Yordhaanukku Neraayirukkira Kereedh Aatrandaiyile Thangiyirundhaan.
6 kaagangal Avanukku Vidiyarkaalaththil Appamum Iraichchiyum, Saayankaalaththil Appamum Iraichchiyum Konduvandhadhu; Thaagaththirku Andha Aatrin Thanneeraik Kudiththaan.
7 dhesaththil Mazhaipeyyaadhapadiyinaal, Silanaalukkuppinbu Andha Aaru Vatrippoyitru.
8 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Avanukku Undaayitru, Avar:
9 nee Ezhundhu, Seedhonukkaduththa Saaribaadh Oorukkup Poi, Ange Thangiyiru; Unnaip Paraamarikkumpadi Ange Irukkira Oru Vidhavaikkuk Kattalaiyitten Endraar.

10 appadiye Avan Ezhundhu, Saaribaaththukkup Ponaan; Andhap Pattanaththin Olimugavaasalukku Avan Vandha Podhu, Ange Oru Vidhavai Viragu Porukkikkondirundhaal; Avan Avalaip Paarththuk Kooppittu, Naan Kudikkiradharkuk Konjam Thanneer Oru Paaththiraththil Enakkuk Konduvaa Endraan.
11 konduvara Aval Pogirapodhu Avan Avalai Nokkik Kooppittu, Konjam Appamum Un Kaiyile Enakkuk Konduvaa Endraan.

12 adharku Aval: Paanaiyil Oru Pidimaavum Kalayaththil Konjam Enneyume Allaamal, Ennidaththil Oru Adaiyum Illaiyendru Ummudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Jeevanaik Kondu Sollugiren; Idho, Naanum En Kumaaranum Saappittu Seththuppoga, Adhai Enakkum Avanukkum Aayaththappaduththugiradharku Irandu Viragu Porukkugiren Endraal.

13 appozhudhu Eliyaa Avalaip Paarththu: Bayappadaadhe; Nee Poi Un Vaarththaiyinpadi Aayaththappaduththu; Aanaalum Mudhal Adhile Enakku Oru Siriya Adaiyaip Panni Ennidaththil Konduvaa; Pinbu Unakkum Un Kumaaranukkum Pannalaam.

14 karththar Dhesaththinmel Mazhaiyaik Kattalaiyidum Naalmattum Paanaiyin Maa Selavazhindhupovadhum Illai; Kalasaththin Enney Kuraindhupovadhum Illai Endru Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Sollugiraar Endraan.
15 aval Poi, Eliyaavin Sorpadi Seydhaal; Avalum, Ivanum, Aval Veettaarum Aneganaal Saappittaargal.
16 karththar Eliyaavaikkondu Sonna Vaarththaiyinpadiye, Paanaiyile Maa Selavazhindhupogavum Illai; Kalasaththin Enney Kuraindhupogavum Illai.
17 ivaigal Nadandhapinbu, Veettukkaariyaagiya Andha Sthreeyin Magan Vyaadhiyil Vizhundhaan; Avanudaiya Suvaasam Pogumattum Avanudaiya Vyaadhi Adhigariththukkonde Irundhadhu.
18 appozhudhu Aval Eliyaavai Nokki: Dhevanudaiya Manushane, Enakkum Umakkum Enna? En Akkiramaththai Ninaikkappannavum, En Kumaaranai Saagappannavumaa Ennidaththil Vandheer? Endraal.
19 adharku Avan: Un Kumaaranai Ennidaththil Thaa Endru Solli, Avanai Aval Madiyilirundhu Eduththu, Thaan Thangiyirukkira Melveettile Avanaik Kondupoi, Than Kattilinmel Vaiththu:
20 en Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Naan Thangiyirukka Idankoduththa Indha Vidhavaiyin Maganai Saagappanninadhinaal Avalukku Dhukkaththai Varuviththeero Endru Karththarai Nokkik Kooppittu;
21 andhap Pillaiyinmel Moondru Tharam Kuppuravizhundhu: En Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Indhap Pillaiyin Aaththumaa Avanukkul Thirumbivarappannum Endrukarththarai Nokki Vinnappam Panninaan.
22 karththar Eliyaavin Saththaththaik Kettaar; Pillaiyinudaiya Aaththumaa Avanul Thirumbivandhadhu; Avan Pizhaiththaan.
23 appozhudhu Eliyaa Pillaiyai Eduththu, Melveettilirundhu Avanaik Keezhveettirkul Konduvandhu, Avanai Avan Thaayinidaththil Koduththu: Paar Un Pillai Uyirodirukkiraan Endru Sonnaan.
24 appozhudhu Andha Sthree Eliyaavai Nokki: Neer Dhevanudaiya Manushan Endrum, Ummudaiya Vaayilirundhu Pirakkum Karththarin Vaarththai Unmai Endrum, Idhinaal Ippodhu Arindhirukkiren Endraal.
